meanings.definition: Showing a lack of respect or rudeness.
meanings.sent1: Her arsy behavior towards the teacher got her in trouble.
meanings.sent2: He always has an arsy attitude towards his classmates.
meanings.sent3: Despite his arsy remarks, everyone found his bluntness amusing.
meanings.sent4: The customer's arsy tone made the salesperson uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The child's arsy behavior at the party was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Having a bad attitude or being difficult to deal with.
meanings.sent1: Dealing with her arsy behavior was challenging for the team.
meanings.sent2: He can be quite arsy when things don't go his way.
meanings.sent3: Even though he was being arsy, his friends still liked him.
meanings.sent4: The arsy weather made the picnic impossible.
meanings.sent5: Her arsy attitude made it hard for others to approach her.
